duties_responsibilities.duty: Work as a technical expert with clients, analysts, programmers and other team members to develop technical solutions to complex business problems.

Lead and participate in the development, testing, implementation, maintenance, and support of highly complex solutions in adherence to company standards, including robust unit testing and support for subsequent release testing.
Solve complex technical and operational problems. Act as a resource for teammates with less experience.
Provide automated monitoring capabilities, providing warranty support, and providing knowledge transfer to production support.
Develop code in accordance with the acceptance criteria established by the Product Owner.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree and six to ten years of experience in software engineering or equivalent education and software engineering training or experience. Master’s degree and ten+ years of experience preferred.
